items.content_html: The Student Photo Extractor is a lightweight tool designed to fetch student photos directly from the GIET University ERP system using a structured URL pattern. By providing the roll number, the tool generates the appropriate link and retrieves the corresponding photo in real-time.
items.title: keshavsharma5118/photo-extractor-frontend: The Student Photo Extractor is a lightweight tool designed to fetch student photos directly from the GIET University ERP system using a structured URL pattern. By providing the roll number, the tool generates the appropriate link and retrieves the corresponding photo in real-time.
